name: Temporal Flip
description:
Solve puzzles with the power of time reversal and your laser! Be careful not to screw yourself up!

Get both of your bots onto the goal pad at the same time! sounds easy right? the problem is, whenever you switch control to the other bot, time flips!

Think in 4 dimensions as you try these 13 mind and time bending puzzles! use your laser to push boxes and activate switches!.. but things might not quite work the same if time is rewinding...

--------------------------------------------------------------------------

Big thanks to Conkorer for the music

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCq23L9qhnVsRWFRiPXDCIuQ
